detail.description: National Standard (India) Limited, incorporated in 1962, is presently engaged in the business of Real Estate Development. The Co. is a part of the Lodha Group Since May 2011. It is a subsidiary of Ananthnath Constructions and Farms Private Limited. [1] [2]
